info.name: My Little YouTube (ParallaxMLP)
info.description: You like Ponies? You like Youtube? This Stylish will add a small little cute pony beside the Youtube Logo!
info.additionalInfo:
The picture used is from ParallaxMLP on deviantArt, go visit him! Original Picture: http://parallaxmlp.deviantart.com/art/My-Little-YouTube-398322317 See the deviantArt pony! My Little DeviantART See the SoundCloud pony! My Little SoundCloud Updates:
  • 12 April 2018: Now (only) working with the new Material Design YouTube! Only light theme for now. Dark comming soon.
  • 31 March 2016: The pony can float again (thanks cloneddragon !)
  • 04 July 2015: Fix and removed floating pony (doesn't work well)
  • 22 February 2014: Fix for embed player
  • 21 February 2014: Fix for the new Youtube Design
  • 5th February 2014: Fix with some recent Youtube changes
  • 3rd October 2013: Fix for Firefox users!
  • 28th October 2013: Fix with some search bar bug
  • 30th October 2013: Mini-Fix + Changed a bit the size. (thanks cloneddragon !)
  • 3rd November 2013: Cloneddragon said there's some changes. So, update!
Permission: http://comments.deviantart.com/1/398322317/3202247228 You can see my deviantArt page here: http://mkody.deviantart.com/ Or you can follow me on Twitter (french): @MKody_ Some tags: Bronies, Ponies, Brony, Brony, youtube, YT, Parallax, MLP, My Little Pony

data.title: the video its infront of everything in the page
